channel.title: quantum on Datafortress.cloud
channel.description: Recent content in quantum on Datafortress.cloud

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-09
item.description: The 7 biggest announcements from Apple’s Peek Performance event (3 minute read) Apple announced a new version of the iPhone SE, a new desktop Mac, an external monitor, and more at its Peek Performance event.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-01-18
item.description: The PinePhone Pro brings upgraded hardware to the Linux phone (3 minute read) Pine64 is now taking preorders for the PinePhone Pro, the fastest mainline Linux smartphone on the market.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-12-31
item.description: Samsung’s leaked Galaxy S22 Ultra is just straight up a Galaxy Note now (2 minute read) A newly leaked official render of Samsung’s Galaxy S22 Ultra shows a device that is pretty much a Note in every way except for its name.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-11-08
item.description: Cruise lays out its plan for ‘how’ it will make robotaxis a reality (7 minute read) GM’s self-driving subsidiary Cruise recently presented a roadmap for how the company will build autonomous vehicles that will be safer and more scalable than any human-driven vehicle.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-10-06
item.description: Amazon is reportedly working on a smart fridge (2 minute read) Project Pulse is a smart fridge being developed at Amazon that will be able to track inventory and purchase habits, predict what customers need, and have those products delivered.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2021-01-12
item.description: Samsung’s CES 2021 robots will clean your house and pour you a glass of wine (6 minute read) Samsung unveiled three new robots at its virtual CES press conference on Monday.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-21
item.description: Amazon’s answer to SpaceX Starlink delivers 400Mbps in prototype phase (7 minute read) Amazon’s Project Kuiper has completed initial development on its Ka-band phased-array antenna for its customer terminal.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-08-28
item.description: TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer to leave the company (4 minute read) TikTok CEO Kevin Mayer has resigned from the company just months after his appointment.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-07-06
item.description: Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 3 software detailed in new leak (2 minute read) Samsung’s Galaxy Watch 3 will likely feature customizable watch faces and updates to its music, email, and calendar apps.
